statements.query: MATCH (:OCITenancy{ocid: {OCI_TENANCY_ID}})-[:OCI_INSTANCE]->(n:OCIInstance) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:OCITenancy{ocid: {OCI_TENANCY_ID}})-[r:OCI_INSTANCE]->(:OCIInstance) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r)
